timeline.body: I don't see this field in the git user information (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/reference/git#get-a-commit).  Where are you finding this?
timeline.bodyText: I don't see this field in the git user information (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/reference/git#get-a-commit).  Where are you finding this?

replies.bodyText:
Hm, I see it here: 
  
    
      github-api/src/test/resources/org/kohsuke/github/GHEventPayloadTest/push.json
    
    
         Line 21
      in
      19e1a00
    
    
    
    

        
          
           "username": "baxterthehacker" 
        
    
  

 but it isn't in the current GitHub docs.  Might be only present in older versions of GitHub Server?
replies.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: I have it in GitHub (global; not enterprise) standard webhook notification on push event
replies.author: seregamorph

replies.bodyText:
@seregamorph
Interesting. Is it possible it is only present on events?
This doesn't include it: https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/commits/7fd1a60b01f91b314f59955a4e4d4e80d8edf11d
I'd be okay with adding this if the javadoc clearly states that is only seen on events and we add @Preview @Deprecated annotations to it.  I would also ask that you contact GitHub support and ask them to clarify the documentation.
replies.author: bitwiseman
seregamorph

replies.bodyText: The topic is published https://github.community/t/push-event-structure-author-committer-id-for-commits/134109 but there is still no answers.

timeline.body:
https://docs.github.com/en/developers/webhooks-and-events/webhook-events-and-payloads#push
Has `compare` in the example but not in the documented fields.  Not sure which is in error. 😢

replies.bodyText: You can check the Webhook payload example on the link that you gave, the field is here (but not listed in description, right)

timeline.body:
The commit aspect is mentioned on line 8 above.  I see you're trying to be clear.  Maybe the suggestion below?

```suggestion
     * Gets the git user name for an author or committer on a git commit.
```
timeline.bodyText:
The commit aspect is mentioned on line 8 above.  I see you're trying to be clear.  Maybe the suggestion below?
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Gets name (e.g. from git commit).
          
          
            
                 * Gets the git user name for an author or committer on a git commit.
timeline.bodyHTML:
The commit aspect is mentioned on line 8 above. I see you're trying to be clear. Maybe the suggestion below?

Suggested change
* Gets name (e.g. from git commit).
* Gets the git user name for an author or committer on a git commit.
timeline.author: bitwiseman

timeline.body:
```suggestion
     * Gets the git email for an author or committer on a git commit.
```
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Gets email (e.g. from git commit).
          
          
            
                 * Gets the git email for an author or committer on a git commit.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* Gets email (e.g. from git commit).
* Gets the git email for an author or committer on a git commit.
